name: JS6 - DevTools & Debugging

images.description: Week 9 project rubric with point allocations: Completion (160 pts), GitHub (140 pts), Errors (70 pts), Video (30 pts)
Week 9 assignment details and requirements focusing on DevTools and debugging

rubricDescription: This assignment focuses on using DevTools and debugging techniques. Students will create a JavaScript application that demonstrates their understanding of debugging tools. The rubric evaluates completion (160 pts), GitHub repository setup (140 pts), errors/functionality (70 pts), and video explanation (30 pts), for a total of 400 possible points.
